estimated future start date WHAT WE OFFER: Paid sick leave based on state regulations after 90 days of employment Medical, dental, and vision are offered after a waiting period (60% paid by Fortuna) Free TeleMedicine and Mental Health for all employees and their families Additional volunteer options such as Group Life Insurance, Accidental Insurance, Critical Care, Short Term Disability WHAT YOU'LL DO: Migrate and redesign LADWP's CRM data warehouse for scalability and performance Develop dashboards and reports using Oracle Analytics Server (OAS) or Power BI Implement predictive modeling and segmentation tools to enhance customer intelligence Ensure high data quality and seamless integration with internal and external systems WHAT YOU'LL BRING: Required Qualifications: 5+ years of experience in data engineering and analytics roles Proficiency in Oracle Analytics Server, SQL, and ETL development tools Demonstrated experience with AI/ML techniques for predictive modeling Strong background in data visualization and reporting platforms Preferred Qualifications: Utility or public sector experience supporting large-scale data environments Fortuna operates as a staffing agency that sources, screens, and presents potential candidates for employment opportunities onä»£è¡¨æˆ‘ä»¬çš„å®¢æˆ·ã€‚ Fortunaç”±æ‹¥æœ‰è¶…è¿‡50å¹´åˆå¹¶ç»éªŒçš„ä¸“ä¸šäººå£«äº2012å¹´åˆ›ç«‹ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬çš„æ€»éƒ¨ä½äºåŠ åˆ©ç¦å°¼äºšå·çš„éº¦å…‹è±ä¼¦ï¼Œä¸â€¦
